Articles.Content:
Is there any mods for even smaller docking ports? For making endpoints on dromomans robotic arms, Or Just smaller ships/rovers.

I have been looking for this forever but have not found anything. Not even tweak scale works...

Alas, I don't think there are any mods for smaller ports. However, the mod "Kerbal Attachment System" adds winches, pylons, and other handy stuff, plus giving you the ability to pick up and carry small parts. Alas, I don't think it's been updated to 0.24 yet, but I think there's a modified 0.24 dll that someone created for it.
Yes, Been playing with it for some time. But I want small docking ports and KAS can't really substitute for something as simple as a small docking port.

Docking ports and claws attached to IR parts (including Dromoman) are a Bad IdeaTM. Please read the whole first post for IR and every other mod you use. Instead, you can use KAS magnets safely since they don't dock. TweakScale can resize the standard KAS magnet, and ZodiusInfuser recently released a KAS magnet "Grabber" on the in IR Rework thread.

Edited August 27, 2014 by Master Tao
There are a few wheel/rover modes that use "hitches", but they require mating male to female i believe. But it's still probably not a good idea to use them with KAS.
